IGeometryObject Class Reference

IGeometryObject is an interface for providing geometry related functionality. Any objects that modify geometry data are required to implement this class. More...

#include <Geometry.h>

virtual const Math::Vector3 * GetScale (void)=0

Detailed Description

IGeometryObject is an interface for providing geometry related functionality. Any objects that modify geometry data are required to implement this class.

Member Function Documentation
